overview: After the fall of Ilocano townsmen against the Spaniards, Regta—the wife of one of the Basi Revolt leaders—makes her way to San Ildefonso to find her fallen husband. Along her way in the mountains and rivers of Ilocos, she unexpectedly meets different Ilocano townsmen who also cry for justice for their loved ones. Their personal reasons test their quest for insurrection and true solidarity.
title: Regta
